level.heading: COMMISSION PROCEEDINGS FOR REVIEW OF ARBITRATION AGREEMENTS (ยง 15-2620) Within thirty (30) calendar days of the date that an arbitration agreement isubmitted to the Commission, the Commission shall either approve or reject therbitration agreement, or portions thereof, in accordance with the standards of7 U.S.C. ยง 252(e)(2). The Commission shall make written findings as to anyeficiencies in the arbitration agreement when the agreement is rejected.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at47 DCR 5242 (June 23, 2000)EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at47 DCR 8315 (October 20,000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 2905 (March 19, 2004).
